Class MadoscopeEngine

java.lang.Object
  MadoscopeEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
HoroscopeEngine
public class MadoscopeEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements HoroscopeEngine

The MadoscopeEngine has a set of "horoscope" templates as well as a set of verbs, adjectives and nouns from which to pull. The engine will randomly substitue these parts of speech values into a horoscope to generate a "Madoscope"!
